Package think.rpgitems.power.impl

Class PowerDelayedCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • think.rpgitems.power.impl.BasePower
      • think.rpgitems.power.impl.PowerCommand
        • think.rpgitems.power.impl.PowerDelayedCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Power, PowerHurt, PowerLeftClick, PowerRightClick, PowerSneak, PowerSprint
    public class PowerDelayedCommand
extends PowerCommand
    Power delayedcommand.

    The item will run PowerCommand.command on click with a delay giving the permission PowerCommand.permission just for the use of the command.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
